Welcome to Gray House

Gray House offers an unforgettable culinary experience. Our award-winning Chef specializes in authentic Mediterranean cuisine with fresh, local ingredients and original recipes.

You have the choice to dine on our outdoor terrace and enjoy a panoramic view of the Adriatic Sea, or to join us inside for live classical music and charming decor.

We offer a daily menu of flavorful soups and freshly-caught fish, farm-to-table fruits and vegetables, and a variety of homemade breads and pastries baked daily.

Our Location

We are located in Zadar, Croatia, directly on the coast of the Adriatic Sea. Gray House is a convenient 10-minute walk from the historic city center and its famous castle walls, landmarks, and attractions.

Zadar is famous for its long history of the culinary arts. We serve a mix of classic, cultural dishes from time-tested recipes, and original creations that have quickly become well-known favorites of locals and visitors alike.

Karma 1105, Zadar, Croatia 23000 Get Directions
